nodes.text: Bralanak City was a city situated on Trymant IV, surrounded by an ocean. It was the most populated area on the planet. Several years before the Great Hyperspace Disaster and subsequent Emergences, a commune of the Elders of the Path settled in Bralanak City, where they owned a meeting house. The city came under threat from hyperspace debris from an Emergence, leading the Jedi cruiser Star Hopper, the only Jedi or Galactic Republic starship within range, to lend assistance.
